backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user auth, profile management, builder sessions, and opportunity storage with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of many frontend file paths to concise descriptions of their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the root React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, global layout, theme provider, and top-level routes including the builder page.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: UI shell with header, navigation (including AI App Builder), mobile menu, and site footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/BuilderLogi: Displays a login screen using Internet Identity with loading handling and basic feature descriptions.
frontend/src/components/BrowseFiltersBar: Filter bar component providing controls for location, category, barrier level, and sort mode with clear-all logic.
frontend/src/components/builder/BuilderS: Provides the main layout shell for the builder, including sessions panel, transcript area, and composer.
frontend/src/components/builder/ChatComp: Text input form for sending builder chat messages with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/builder/ChatTran: Displays chat messages with auto‑scrolling, placeholders, and role‑based message styling.
frontend/src/components/builder/ProfileS: Modal dialog prompting users to enter and save their profile name on first use.
frontend/src/components/builder/Sessions: Sidebar for listing, selecting, and creating builder sessions with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedOpportun: Fetches and displays featured opportunities with loading skeletons, error handling, and a grid of OpportunityCard components.
Renders an opportunity card showing metadata, score, description, and links, with optional featured styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilderMessages.ts: Loads and appends builder chat messages for a session using backend actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilderSessions.ts: Fetches and creates user builder sessions, invalidating queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides a React Query hook to load and save the current user's profile via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureXerisFeature: Initializes a featured Xeris opportunity once and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeaturedOpportunit: Fetches a list of featured opportunities from the actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, auth client setup, and login/logout state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunities.ts: Loads filtered opportunities from the actor based on remote, category, and barrier values.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunity.ts: Fetches a single opportunity by ID using React Query.
Provides a mutation to submit a new opportunity and invalidates related opportunity queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, theme colors, typography, and utility classes including glow and gradient effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details and feature explanations for the platform.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Implements the browse interface with filters, URL sync, featured section, and sorted opportunity listings.
frontend/src/pages/BuilderPage.tsx: Main builder interface handling authentication, session selection, message flow, and rendering of chat-based app planning UI.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, calls to action, and featured opportunity integration.
frontend/src/pages/OpportunityDetailsPag: Loads and displays full details for a specific opportunity with badges, metadata, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitOpportunityPage: Form page for submitting new opportunities with validation, submission handling, and navigation on success.
frontend/src/utils/builderAssistant.ts: Rule-based generator producing deterministic app plans from user prompts by detecting keywords and features.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the app’s current version, goals, and a list of implemented features for the SIDEHUSL rebrand.
